meanings.definition: Engaged in action; characterized by energetic movement.
meanings.sent1: The kids were very active during recess, running and playing games.
meanings.sent2: The athlete is known for his active lifestyle and dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent3: The active squirrel kept darting around the park, gathering nuts in a frenzy.
meanings.sent4: Her active imagination painted vivid pictures of far-off lands in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The active volcano rumbled and spewed lava, creating a fiery spectacle.

meanings.sent1: The factory is active 24 hours a day, producing goods for the market.
meanings.sent2: The computer system remains active even during the night for updates.
meanings.sent3: The active vending machine dispensed snacks with a cheerful hum.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an active machine, constantly processing new information.
meanings.sent5: The active beehive buzzed with life as the bees worked together.

meanings.definition: Participating or engaged in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: She is an active member of the book club, attending every meeting.
meanings.sent2: The students were active participants in the science experiment, eager to learn.
meanings.sent3: The active volunteers worked tirelessly to clean up the park after the event.
meanings.sent4: His active involvement in the community made a positive impact on those around him.
meanings.sent5: The active team collaborated effectively to complete the project ahead of schedule.
